page.title: 17Shopping in the Area.
page.content: Altogether we found only four shops in the area that we were studying.One of these shops,a Post Office,was in Reedness.In Laxton there was another shop,also a Post Office,while in Hook there were two shops,a Post Office and a Village Store.All the Post Offices had a general counter and catered for the day to day needs of the people in the area that they served.The Post Office in Hook also had an Off Licence Department.The Village Store at Hook is also the local Newsagent.In all the villages local tradesmen called in their vans selling goods such as wet fish,meat,bread and fried fish and chips.The Humberside County Council Mobile Library also paid regular visits.For main shopping needs people have to go to the nearest large town,Goole,or even further to Hull,Doncaster or Scunthorpe.
